name: Monke Banana
description:
Move with WASD and jump with SPACE.

The game was designed as a side scrolling game where our goal is to collect as many bananas as possible and dodge the blue bananas which will take away our lives.

Red bananas will give us a life instead.

Eventually the player will have to choose whether to return to normal or continue living as a monkey.

All assets are designed by me using Aseprite.
